generated.css: :root{--modal-duration:1s;--primary-color:#30336b;--secondary-color:#be2edd}.spinner{display:flex;width:100%;height:80px;justify-content:center}.spinner:after{content:" ";display:block;width:64px;height:64px;margin:8px;border-radius:50%;border-color:teal transparent;border-style:solid;border-width:6px;animation:spinner 1.2s linear infinite}@keyframes spinner{0%{transform:rotate(0deg)}to{transform:rotate(1turn)}}.cart-items{list-style:none;margin:0;padding:0;max-height:20rem;overflow-x:hidden;overflow-y:auto}.cart-item{display:flex;justify-content:space-between;align-items:center;border-bottom:2px solid #8a2b06;padding:1rem 0;margin:1rem 0}.cart-item h2{margin:0 0 .5rem;color:#363636}.summary{width:13rem;display:flex;justify-content:space-between;align-items:center}.price{color:#8a2b06}.amount,.price{font-weight:700}.amount{border:1px solid #ccc;padding:.25rem .75rem;border-radius:6px;color:#363636}.pic{width:100%;height:auto;border-radius:50%}.form__container{background-color:rgba(0,0,0,.6);display:none;position:fixed;top:0;left:0;right:0;bottom:0}.form__container.show__modal{display:block}.form__modal{background-color:#fff;border-radius:5px;box-shadow:0 0 10px rgba(0,0,0,.3);position:absolute;overflow:hidden;top:50%;left:50%;transform:translate(-50%,-50%);max-width:100%;width:400px;animation:modalopen var(--modal-duration)}.modal__form__header{background-color:var(--primary-color);color:#fff;padding:15px}.modal__form__header h3{margin:0;border-bottom:1px solid #333}.modal__form__content{padding:20px}.modal__form div{margin:15px 0}.modal__form label{display:block;margin-bottom:5px}.modal__form .form-input{padding:8px;width:100%}.close-btn{background:transparent;font-size:25px;position:absolute;top:0;right:0}.modal__form__content input[type=submit]{background-color:var(--primary-color)}.modal__form__content input[type=submit],button,input[type=submit]{border:0;border-radius:5px;color:#fff;cursor:pointer;padding:8px 12px}button,input[type=submit]{background-color:var(--secondary-color)}button:focus{outline:none}@keyframes modalopen{form{opacity:0}to{opacity:1}}#detailsModal.show{display:block}.recipe{background-color:#fff;border-top:1px solid #fff}.recipe__fig{height:20rem;position:relative;transform:scale(1.04) translateY(-1px);transform-origin:top;padding-left:.6rem;padding-right:.6rem}.recipe__img{width:100%;display:block;height:100%;object-fit:cover}.recipe__title{position:absolute;bottom:0;left:50%;transform:translate(-50%,20%) skewY(-6deg);color:#fff;font-weight:700;font-size:1.4rem;text-transform:uppercase;width:70%;line-height:2.5;text-align:center}.recipe__title span{-webkit-box-decoration-break:clone;box-decoration-break:clone;padding:1rem;background-image:linear-gradient(to right bottom,#fbdb89,#f48982)}.recipe__details{justify-content:space-around}.recipe__details,.recipe__info{display:flex;align-items:center}.recipe__info{font-size:1.5rem;text-transform:uppercase;justify-content:center;padding:1.5rem}.recipe__info-icon{height:2rem;width:2rem;fill:#f59a83}.recipe__info-people{margin-right:.4rem;font-weight:600}.recipe__love{background-image:linear-gradient(to right bottom,#fbdb89,#f48982);border:none;cursor:pointer;margin-left:auto;transition:all .2s}.recipe__love:hover{transform:scale(1.07)}.recipe__love:focus{outline:none}.recipe__ingredients{padding:2rem 1rem;font-size:1.5rem;line-height:1.4;background-color:#f2efee;display:flex;flex-direction:column;align-items:center}.recipe__ingredient-list{display:grid;grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr;grid-column-gap:1.5rem;grid-row-gap:1.5rem;list-style:none;margin-bottom:2rem}.recipe__item{display:flex;font-size:small}.recipe__icon{height:1.8rem;width:1.8rem;color:#f59a83;padding:2px;margin-right:1rem;flex:0 0 auto;margin-top:.1rem}.recipe__count{margin-right:.5rem;flex:0 0 auto}.btn-small{background-image:linear-gradient(to right bottom,#fbdb89,#f48982);border-radius:10rem;border:none;color:#fff;cursor:pointer;display:flex;align-items:center;transition:all .2s}.btn-small:hover{transform:scale(1.05)}.btn-small:focus{outline:none}.btn-small>:first-child{margin-right:1rem}
